Sentencas: Due to the high operating temperatures (900-1000-degrees-C) the material demands upon Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) components are quite stringent.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Preferably lower operating temperatures (700-800-degrees-C) are desired so that gas feed lines, heat exchanges, and structure components can be fabricated from relatively cheap stainless steel components.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Typically, the materials used in a SOFC are yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) as the solid electrolyte, nickel-zirconia cermet as the anode, strontium-doped lanthanum manganite as the cathode, and magnesium-doped lanthanum chromite as the interconnection material.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: The electrolyte and interconnect are difficult to fabricate, because they need to be gas tight, yet thin (30-50 microns) and mechanically stable.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Due to the high volatility of CrO3 the densification of LaCrO3 into thin layers is a more demanding challenge than the fabrication of the electrolyte.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: Electrochemical Vapor Deposition is the key technology for making thin layers of the solid electrolyte as well as the interconnection material LaCrO3.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: In the simplest case the oxide growth can be modeled with the Wagner oxidation theory for metals.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS

Sentencas: In this paper theory and experiment of the growth of ionically conducting YSZ and electronically conducting LaCrO3 will be discussed.
Titulo: ELECTROCHEMICAL VAPOR-DEPOSITION OF STABILIZED ZIRCONIA AND INTERCONNECTION MATERIALS FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS
